messages.title: STOP BREXIT. BUILD A BRIGHTER FUTURE
messages.content: People are fed up with the Brexit chaos. Immense pressures on NHS, economy, and education. Lib Dems will stop Brexit and address crisis in NHS and schools.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Free Childcare and a Fairer Economy
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Lib Dems to provide free childcare from 9 months and give every adult £10,000 to spend on skills and training.
Liberal Democrats pledge to cancel Brexit if they win general election.

issues.brexitEurope: People are fed up with the Brexit chaos. Brexit undermines every part of our economy, threatens jobs, public services including the NHS, and opportunities for children and grandchildren. Lib Dems pledge to cancel Brexit if they win general election.
issues.economy: Families are working harder than ever, but far too many are struggling to get by. Lib Dems to provide free childcare from 9 months and give every adult £10,000 to spend on skills and training.
issues.education: Lib Dems will address the crises in our NHS and schools.
issues.health: Lib Dems will address the crises in our NHS and schools.

endorsements.endorsement: "I used to vote Conservative, now I'm voting Lib Dem"

quotes.text: "The Lib Dem fightback is real – and it’s changing everything."
"I’m leaving the Tories and voting Lib Dem. So any Tory voter who still loyally votes for self-destructive ends must be folly of the highest order."
quotes.source: Matthew Parris in The Times, May 2019

quotes.text: "Boris Johnson is a compulsive liar who has betrayed every single person he ever had any dealings with."
quotes.source: Former Conservative MP, Nick Boles, Nov 2019

examples: Liberal Democrats to provide free childcare from 9 months.
Lib Dems to give every adult £10,000 to spend on skills and training.
People are fed up with the Brexit chaos.
Jo Swinson’s Liberal Democrats are the strongest party of Remain.
Families are working harder than ever.
Whether Conservative blue or Labour red, it is clear that Brexit would be catastrophic for the UK.

examples: "I used to vote Conservative, now I'm voting Lib Dem" - Former Conservative member, Cyndy Robertshaw
Brexit chaos.
"Boris Johnson is a compulsive liar who has betrayed every single person he ever had any dealings with."
"Boris Johnson facing Lib Dems surge."
"Donald Trump backs Johnson’s Brexit strategy – Express, September 2019"
Jo Swinson’s Liberal Democrats are the strongest party of Remain.
Brexit undermines every part of our economy, threatens jobs, public services including the NHS, and opportunities for children and grandchildren.
Both Boris Johnson’s Conservative party and Jeremy Corbyn’s Labour party are determined to pursue Brexit.
Whether Conservative blue or Labour red, it is clear that Brexit would be catastrophic for the UK.
